p: In streptozocin diabetic mice, the incorporation of E. globulus aqueous leaf extract in the diet (62.5 gm/kg) and drinking water (2.5 g/L) reduced hyperglycemia in a dose-dependent manner, with the partial restoration of pancreatic Î²-cells. In addition, the hypoglycemic effect was seen in alloxan diabetic rats treated with the plant extract. The antihyperglycemic effect with the improvement in insulin level was reported in streptozocin rats fed with plant leaf powder [ 129, 216, 217].
